meaning: Panic and choose any path / Flee in panic
description: Meaning 「too panicked to choose a path」. In the phrase 「Panic chooses no path, hunger chooses no food, cold chooses no clothes, poverty chooses no wife」, it means one will do anything in desperate times.

examples.chinese: 醉驾司机遇盘查,慌不择路冲进绿化带
examples.translation: Drunk driver met a check, panicked and drove into the green belt

examples.chinese: 地震突然来袭,别慌不择路
examples.translation: Earthquake strikes suddenly, don't flee in panic

examples.chinese: 流浪小猫被孩子们追的无处可躲慌不择路跑到小区的外边
examples.translation: Stray kitten chased by children, panicked and ran outside the residential compound
